ruleset.name: My Custom PMD Ruleset
ruleset.description: This is a custom PMD ruleset file.

rule.name: PublicEnumInClassDetector
rule.description: This rule detects public enums inside classes.

rule.name: OnlyConstantsDetector
rule.message: Classes that only have constants are discouraged. Consider using an interface or an enum instead.
rule.description: This rule detects classes that only have constants.

rule.name: AssertStatementFirstInPublicFunctionRule
rule.message: Public functions with only an assert statement as their first are discouraged. Consider using an assert statement in the test instead.
rule.description: This rule detects functions with only one statement, which is an assert statement.
